name: Celery
properties: Celery contains antioxidants called flavones, they have an important role in lowering blood sugar levels.

name: Spinach
properties: Spinach consumption is associated with lower risk of developing type 2 diabetes. Among diabetics, higher green vegetable intake is associated with lower HbA1c levels.

name: Eggs
properties: High source of biological value protein, good cholesterol, (High-Density Lipoprotein), which is good for heart health. It improves insulin sensitivity. They give satiety and improve blood sugar levels.

name: Quinoa
properties: Fiber and protein combination found in quinoa, Satiety and have better blood sugar control. Protein also helps with the uptake of carbohydrates so the body can process them more easily.

name: Black Gram Lentils(Urad Dal)
properties: Lentils are rich in resistant starch. It has a very minimal impact on your blood sugar levels because it passes through the body undigested and ultimately ends up feeding the healthy bacteria at the bottom of your digestive tract.

name: Cinnamon
properties: Cinnamon is a potent antioxidant activity. Cinnamon may improve blood sugar control, insulin sensitivity, cholesterol and triglyceride levels in type 2 diabetics.

name: Chia Seeds
properties: Chia seeds contain high amounts of fiber, are low in digestible carbs and may decrease blood pressure and inflammation.

name: Turmeric
properties: The active ingredient, curcumin, can lower inflammation and blood sugar levels. Consume turmeric with piperine (found in black pepper) in order to boost absorption by as much as 2,000%.

name: Salmon
properties: Salmon have an excellent amount of Omega-3 fatty acids (DHA and EPA) which is good for diabetics.
